title: Your Tuesday Briefing: Jair Bolsonaro Loses
description: But he has not conceded Brazil’s presidential election.
dc:creator: Amelia Nierenberg
category: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
media:credit: Dado Galdieri for The New York Times
media:description: Supporters of President Jair Bolsonaro watched in Brasília, Brazil, as the results of the country’s presidential election were announced on Sunday.
